summary: The United States is made up of 50 states, a federal district (Washington, D.C.), and five major territories. Each state has its own government and constitution, and they all send representatives to the federal Congress. The US also controls 14 territories, five of which are inhabited. The states vary in size and population, with California being the most populous and Alaska the largest by area. The latest states to join were Alaska and Hawaii in 1959. Among the territories, Puerto Rico has the highest population and the most extensive land area.
title: List of states and territories of the United States
